verse_no: स एतेन प्राज्ञेनाऽऽत्मनाऽस्माल्लोकादुत्क्रम्यामुष्मिन् स्वर्गे लोके सर्वान्‌ कामानाप्त्वाऽमृतः समभवत्‌ समभवत्‌ ॥
meaning: Meaning:This verse from the Brahma Sutras states that the person who possesses the knowledge of the supreme reality, Brahman, and has realized their own true nature (Atman), upon departing from this world, attains the heavenly world. In that realm, they attain all their desires and become immortal, merging into the ultimate reality of Brahman.
